text: Decatur is a city and county seat of Morgan County, Alabama. It has a population of about 58,000 people. Decatur has an area of about 60 miles and sits at a height of about 561 feet. == References == == Other websites == * *Official City Tourist Website Category:County seats in Alabama Category:Cities in Alabama Category:1820s establishments in Alabama Category:1821 establishments in the United States
title: Decatur, Alabama
